N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-3.1 - Eligibility for SSPNA
State Regulations

No separate application for SSPNA shall be required or
accepted by NYS. Eligibility for SSPNA is contingent upon an individual or
couple residing in NYS being found eligible for federal SSI benefits who meets
all other State eligibility criteria for receipt of a prospective SSPNA benefit
as of such time that the federal SSA electronic data file containing such
individual's or couple's relevant SSI eligibility determination is transmitted
to NYS via the SDX with federal payment status codes as defined in section
398-2.1
of this Part. Eligibility
for SSPNA benefits will be deemed to begin the same month in which ongoing SSI
eligibility was established. SSPNA benefits are payable as of the month that
SSI benefits begin. Notes
